articles.title: Queen cancelled two virtual engagements to rest her 'croaky voice' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 95-year-old head of state, who tested positive for Covid-19 on Sunday, cancelled virtual engagements on Tuesday and yesterday because she was not feeling well enough.
